content:
I am using $apply-codesystem-delta-add operation to add some concepts for code system after code system creation; I realized it doesn't add any concept properties, I already opened an issue regarding this on the following:
https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/issues/1725
I see now it dose not store any other information for concept except code, display for example we need the definition
I see its very helpful operation; is their any plan to improve it or shall we start new pull request for it ?
